  // Ja3 it3=null;
    private void okMouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        
        
        String iname=tname.getText();
        
       // int isa=Integer.parseInt(tsa.getText()); 
       // int isb=Integer.parseInt(tsb.getText());
        
        boolean icat1= cat1.isSelected();
        boolean icat2= cat2.isSelected();
       
        
        
       /*boolean imem1= tmem1.isSelected();
        boolean imem2= tmem2.isSelected();
        boolean imem3= tmem3.isSelected();
        boolean imem4= tmem4.isSelected();
        String im=0;
        
        */
        
        Ja3 it3=new Ja3(iname,icat1,icat2);
        showit1.setText(it3.rshowi1());
        showit2.setText(it3.rshowi2());
        list.setText(it3.getName());
         System.out.println(it3.isCa1());
        System.out.println(it3.isCa2());
        
        
    }                               

    private void tpayActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                    

    private void tmem3ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                     

    private void showit1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                        
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                       

    private void okokMouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                  
      
        String iname=tname.getText();
        
       boolean imem1= tmem1.isSelected();
        boolean imem2= tmem2.isSelected();
        boolean imem3= tmem3.isSelected();
        boolean imem4= tmem4.isSelected();
        
         boolean icat1= cat1.isSelected();
        boolean icat2= cat2.isSelected();
        
    int isa=Integer.parseInt(tsa.getText()); 
       int isb=Integer.parseInt(tsb.getText());
        int ipay=Integer.parseInt(tpay.getText());
 
     Ja3 it3=new Ja3(iname,icat1,icat2);
     ja31 itt3 = new ja31(isa,isb,icat1,icat2,ipay);
     itt3.opt(imem1,imem2,imem3,imem4);
 
      
       list.setText(tname.getText()+itt3.opt(imem1,imem2,imem3,imem4)+itt3.showinfo());
       
    }                                 

    private void ok3MouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                 
        int isa=Integer.parseInt(tsa.getText()); 
       int isb=Integer.parseInt(tsb.getText());
        int ipay=Integer.parseInt(tpay.getText());
        boolean imem1= tmem1.isSelected();
        boolean imem2= tmem2.isSelected();
        boolean imem3= tmem3.isSelected();
        boolean imem4= tmem4.isSelected();
        
     String iname=tname.getText();
        
       
        
         boolean icat1= cat1.isSelected();
        boolean icat2= cat2.isSelected();
         Ja3 it3=new Ja3(iname,icat1,icat2);
        ja31 itt3 = new ja31(isa,isb,icat1,icat2,ipay);
         itt3.opt(imem1,imem2,imem3,imem4);
        
        payandchange pandc=new payandchange(isa,isb,icat1,icat2,ipay);
      
        list.setText(tname.getText()+itt3.opt(imem1,imem2,imem3,imem4)+itt3.showinfo());
       System.out.println(tname.getText()+itt3.opt(imem1,imem2,imem3,imem4)+itt3.showinfo()); 

    }                                
=======================================================================================================
public interface ifja3 {
 String opt(boolean mem1, boolean mem2, boolean mem3, boolean mem4);
 //String cacu(int sa,int sb);
    
    
}

=======================================================================================================
package ja3;

import java.util.Date;

/**
 *
 * @author Administrator
 */
public class Ja3 {
        String name;
        
	private Date date;
	private int sum;
        private int total;
        private int sa;
        private int sb;
       
        private boolean mem1;
        private boolean mem2;
        private boolean mem3;
        private boolean mem4;
        private String rshow1;
        private String rshow2;
        
        private boolean ca1;
        private boolean ca2;
      //  private String member;
        private int change;
       
        
        
      public boolean isCa1() {
        return this.ca1;
    }

    public boolean isCa2() {
        return this.ca2;
    }
        

   

    public String getName() {
        return name;
    }

    public Date getDate() {
        return date;
    }

    public int getSum() {
        return sum;
    }

    public int getTotal() {
        return total;
    }

    public int getSa() {
        return sa;
    }

    public int getSb() {
        return sb;
    }

    public boolean isMem1() {
        return mem1;
    }

    public boolean isMem2() {
        return mem2;
    }

    public boolean isMem3() {
        return mem3;
    }

    public boolean isMem4() {
        return mem4;
    }

    

    public int getChange() {
        return change;
    }

    public void setName(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }

    public void setDate(Date date) {
        this.date = date;
    }

    public void setSa(int sa) {
        this.sa = sa;
    }

    public void setSb(int sb) {
        this.sb = sb;
    }

    public void setMem1(boolean mem1) {
        this.mem1 = mem1;
    }

    public void setMem2(boolean mem2) {
        this.mem2 = mem2;
    }

    public void setMem3(boolean mem3) {
        this.mem3 = mem3;
    }

    public void setMem4(boolean mem4) {
        this.mem4 = mem4;
    }

 

    public void setChange(int change) {
        this.change = change;
    }

  
    
    Ja3(String name,boolean ca1, boolean ca2)
    {
        this.name=name;
        this.ca1=ca1;
        this.ca2=ca2;
        
        
       
        
        if(ca1== true && ca2==false)
        {
            rshow1="Ruler(30 dollars)";
            rshow2="Pen(20 dollars)";
            
            
        
        }
        
        else if(ca1==false && ca2== true )
        {
            rshow1="RAM(1500 dollars)";
            rshow2="LCD(3000 dollars)";
           
            
            
        
        }
        
        else
        {
            rshow1="Error";
            rshow2="Error";
            
        
        }
        getRshow1();
        getRshow2();
  
        
    
    }
     /*public int getPa() {
         
         isCa1();
        isCa2();
        
        if(ca2==true&&ca1==false){
            pa=1500;
             return pa;
        }
         if(ca1==true&&ca2==false){
            pa=30;
             return pa;
        }        
        else {
            pa=0;
             return pa;
        }
        
    }

    public int getPb() {
        isCa1();
        isCa2();
       
        
         if(ca2==true && ca1==false){
            pb=3000;
            return pb;
        }
        if(ca1==true && ca2==false){
            pb=20;
            return pb;
        }        
        
         pb=0;
         return pb;
        
    }*/
      public String getRshow1() {
        return this.rshow1;
    }

    public String getRshow2() {
        return this.rshow2;
    }
    
    String rshowi1()
    
    {
           return "1."+getRshow1(); 
    }
    
    String rshowi2()
            
    {
    return "2."+getRshow2(); 
    
    
    }  

=============================================================================================================
/*
 * To change this license header, choose License Headers in Project Properties.
 * To change this template file, choose Tools | Templates
 * and open the template in the editor.
 */
package ja3;


/**
 *
 * @author Administrator
 */
public class ja31  extends Ja3 implements ifja3
{
    int mem=0;
       private String meminfo="";
        double disc=0;

         private int sa;
         private int sb;
         private int sum;
         int total;
         private int pa=0;
         private int pb=0;
         private boolean ca1;        
         private boolean ca2; 
         private String info1;
         private String info2;
         private int pay;
         private int change;
          private String payinfo;

         
         
         
    public ja31(int sa, int sb,boolean ca1,boolean ca2,int pay) {
        
        super(sa,sb);
        this.ca1=ca1;
        this.ca2=ca2;
        
        this.pa=pa;
        this.pb=pb;
        this.info1=info1;
        this.info2=info2;
        
        this.sa=sa;
        this.sb=sb;
        this.disc=disc;
        this.pay=pay;
        this.change=change;
        this.payinfo=payinfo;
       
        
        sum=0;
        
       
        
        
        
        if(ca2==true&&ca1==false){
            pa=1500;
            pb=3000;
            sum=pa*sa+pb*sb;
            info1="RAM(1500 dollars)";
            info2="LCD(3000 dollars)";        
        }
        else if(ca1==true&&ca2==false){
            pa=30;
            pb=20;
            sum=pa*sa+pb*sb;
            info1="Ruler(30 dollars)";
            info2="Pen(20 dollars)";
            
            
        }        
          sum=getPa()*getSa()+getPb()*getSb();  
          total=(int)(getSum()*getDisc()); 
          
          
          
          
         
          
         
             
        
        
    

    
        
        
        
        
    }

    public String getInfo1() {
        return info1;
    }

    public String getInfo2() {
        return info2;
    }

    public boolean isCa1() {
        return ca1;
    }

    public boolean isCa2() {
        return ca2;
    }

    public int getPa() {
         
    
             return this.pa;
        
        
    }

    public int getPb() {
     
       
        
         
         return this.pb;
   
    }

    public int getSa() {
        return sa;
    }

    public int getSb() {
        return sb;
    }

    public int getSum() {
        
       
        return this.sum;
    }
    
    
   
         
       

  

        
    
    //member type
   
    @Override
   public String opt (boolean mem1, boolean mem2, boolean mem3, boolean mem4) 
    {
       
       this.mem=mem;
       this.meminfo=meminfo;
       this.disc=disc;
       
       
        
        
        if(mem1==true) {
            mem=1;
            disc=0.7;
        }
        if(mem2==true ){ 
            mem=2;
            disc=0.85;
        }
        if(mem3==true) {
            mem=3;
            disc=0.9;
        }
        if(mem4==true) {
            
            mem=4;
            disc=1.0;
            
        
        }
        
        
        
        switch(mem)
        {
            case 1:
            { 
                meminfo="\nVIP \n30% off\n";
               // return meminfo;
               sum=getPa()*getSa()+getPb()*getSb();  
               total=(int)(getSum()*getDisc());  
                
                break;  
            }
            case 2:
            {    
                meminfo="\nGolden \n15% off\n";
                //return meminfo;
                sum=getPa()*getSa()+getPb()*getSb();  
                total=(int)(getSum()*getDisc());  
                
                 break;   
            }
            case 3:
            {    
                meminfo="\nSilver \n10% off\n";
               // return meminfo;
                sum=getPa()*getSa()+getPb()*getSb();  
                 total=(int)(getSum()*getDisc());  
               
                 break;   
            }
            case 4:
            {   
                meminfo="\nOriginal \nWith no discount\n";
               // return meminfo;
               sum=getPa()*getSa()+getPb()*getSb();  
                 total=(int)(getSum()*getDisc());  
               
                 break;  
            }
            default :
            {
                 meminfo="\nError\n";
                 //return meminfo;
                 break;    
            }    
        
         
        }
        
        return meminfo;
      
        
    }
   
    public String getMeminfo() {
        return meminfo;
    }

    public double getDisc() {
        return this.disc;
    }

    public int getTotal() {
        
       
       total=(int)(getSum()*disc);
        
        return total;
    }
    
    
    public int getPay() {
        return pay;
    }

    public int getChange() {
       
        change=getPay()-getTotal();
        return change;
    }

    public String getPayinfo() {
         if (getChange()>=0)
              
          {
              payinfo="Change:"+change;
          
          }
          else 
              
          {
              payinfo="Not enough";
          
          }
        
        
        return payinfo;
    }
===================================================================================================================
package ja3;

/**
 *
 * @author jie
 */

這部份自己寫沒寫成功  所以此處功能改為在ja31處
public class payandchange extends ja31{
    
    private int pay;
    private int change;
    private int total;
   
  payandchange(int sa,int sb,boolean ca1,boolean ca2,int pay)
    {
        super(sa, sb,ca1,ca2,pay);
        this.pay=pay;
        total=super.getTotal();
        change=total-pay;
        
        
        
    }

    public int getPay() {
        return pay;
    }

    public int getChange() {
        return change;
    }

    public int getTotal() {
        return total;
    }
  
  
  
 /* String showinfo()
  {
      
      
      
      
      
      
      return  
              "\n"+super.showinfo()+
             
               "\n"+getPay()+
              "\n"+getChange();
             
  
  
  
  
  
              }*/
  
  
 
    
    
}
